import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Radios from '../Radios' const useFormField = () => { const [value, setValue] = useState('') return [value, e => setValue(e.target.value)] } const AddApartment = () => { const user = useSelector(s => s.user) const coliving = useSelector(s => s.coliving) const [rooms, setRooms] = useFormField() const [roomType, handleRoomType] = useFormField() const [photo, setPhoto] = useFormField({}) if (!user) return 'Loading...'; const [isError, setError] = useState(false) const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const appartment = { rooms, roomType, photo, coliving } setError(false) try { const ret = await fetch('http://localhost:3300/host/add/appartment', { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify(appartment), headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + token } }) const data = await ret.json() if (ret.ok) res.send(data) } catch (err) { console.warn('Error:', err) setError(true) } } return (
